description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF A PROPOSED HIP-TO-GABLE CONVERSION, THE ERECTION OF A REAR DORMER, THE INSERTION OF ROOF LIGHTS WITHIN THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE AND THE LAYING OF A HARD SURFACE TO THE FRONTAGE.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The erection of the rear dormer and hip-to-gable conversion would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The insertion of roof lights would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The laying of the hard surface would consist of the alteration of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class F of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class F. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
